title: League Client Issues
body:
it used to be fine until some update i can't remember. the thing is, whenever the game is patching, at some point it'll say that i don't have enough space (which is untrue) or error 004 which i think means the same thing. i tried repairing it but it said i had corrupted files or something? so i reinstalled and still, the problem persisted. yes, i tried opening it as an administrator, didn't work
the only solution that worked for me was booting my pc in safe mode to patch the game.

so i started playing again, and another issue popped up. sometimes, randomly, when i'm about to enter the load screen of a game, it says something about my league files being corrupted i believe and that my game needs to be patched. so i boot up in safe mode, and patch it so i can play again. reaaally annoying

i've gotten tired of this, so i came here to ask for help. is there anything i can do to fix my whole client? i really don't know what could be the issue here :|

replies.body: At this point it might be best to do a full clean uninstall and reinstall using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool). It sounds like some of your files are heavily corrupted or missing entirely so the game just isn't able to run properly anymore.
